esm-desc: Align settings between characters and accounts
evehu-desc: An EVEWho copy for serenity server
xyzdl-desc: Add a download button on XiaoYuZhou (aka Cosmos, a Chinese podcast mobile app) web page
esm-1: Select a base profile, overwrite characters and accounts settings
esm-3: If you installed client in different places before, you may have multiple setting folders on your machine, use "Select Folder" to locate the one you are using
esm-4: Not all data would be copied, eg. channel password
esm-5: Previous versions are made with Python, which have fundamental features to overwrite setting files. They also have smaller file size.
